import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import '../App.css' function LoginPage({ setAuth, ...props }) { function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault() const username = event.target[0].value; const password = event.target[1].value if (!username || !password) return; axios.post('/auth/login', { username, password }) .then((response) => { const data = response.data setAuth(data.token, data.u_id) props.history.push('/teacher') }) .catch((err) => {}); } console.log('Testing') return (

Gallifrey

) } export default LoginPage
